entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
